byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

abstract: Richard Levine and Lyn Greene, two of the executive producers of Starz drama series Boss, announce they are leaving show before work starts on second season.
snippet: The day after the premiere of “Boss,” Deadline Hollywood reported that two of the executive producers of the series, Richard Levine and Lyn Greene, were leaving.
lead_paragraph: The day after the premiere of “Boss,” Deadline Hollywood reported that two of the executive producers of the series, Richard Levine and Lyn Greene, were leaving.

headline.main: Suddenly Two Bosses Leave the Show ‘Boss’
headline.print_headline: Suddenly Two Bosses Leave the Show ‘Boss’
